long_description: Don't let the foul weather outside spoil your urban adventure. The Nau Tripoly Jacket takes a stylish approach towards complete waterproof protection so you can get out there in any condition. Recycled polyester and organic cotton shell with 3-layer waterproof, breathable laminate keeps you dry throughout a rainstorm; seams are sealed for complete protection. Water-resistant front zipper includes a flap to keep the wind out. Snap-off hood with a one-way drawcord can be adjusted for just the right fit. Includes 2 front pockets and 2 drop-in chest pockets; internal zippered pocket and a drop-in pocket hold your sensitive items. The Nau Tripoly Jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: Don't let the foul weather outside spoil your urban adventure. The Nau Tripoly Jacket takes a stylish approach towards complete waterproof protection so you can get out there in any condition.
